name: OuterIntruders (ZX Spectrum Next)
description:
Classic action - arcade game for ZX Spectrum Next computer.

Destroy all the invaders! 

  • Classic game mechanics
  • Mini bosses and enemy hordes 
  • Pixelart graphics
  • Keyboard and Kempstom support
  • Compatible with 1MB and 2MB ZX Spectrum Next versions

This game was done using:

ZX Basic compiler (https://www.boriel.com/ by José Rodríguez Boriel)

NextBuild (http://zxbasic.uk/nextbuild/ by David Saphier)

Duefectu's tech support (http://www.duefectucorp.com/), sorry no memory bank needed this time =)

Shiru's BeepFX engine and sounds (https://shiru.untergrund.net/software.shtml)

Game coded by Oscar BraindeaD in may 2020
